00038 #ifndef _PLT_HTTP_CLIENT_TASK_H_
00039 #define _PLT_HTTP_CLIENT_TASK_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 #include "PltHttp.h"
00046 #include "PltThreadTask.h"
00047 
00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 |   PLT_HttpTcpConnector
00050 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 class PLT_HttpTcpConnector : public NPT_HttpClient::Connector
00056 {
00057 public:
00058     PLT_HttpTcpConnector();
00059     virtual ~PLT_HttpTcpConnector();
00060     
00061     // NPT_HttpClient::Connector methods
00062     virtual NPT_Result Connect(const char*                   hostname, 
00063                                NPT_UInt16                    port, 
00064                                bool                          secure,
00065                                NPT_Timeout                   connection_timeout,
00066                                NPT_Timeout                   io_timeout,
00067                                NPT_Timeout                   name_resolver_timeout,
00068                                NPT_InputStreamReference&     input_stream, 
00069                                NPT_OutputStreamReference&    output_stream);
00070     NPT_Result Abort() { if (!m_Socket.IsNull()) m_Socket->Cancel(); return NPT_SUCCESS; }
00071 
00072 public:
00073     void GetInfo(NPT_SocketInfo& info) { info = m_SocketInfo;}
00074 
00075 private:
00076     NPT_String                 m_HostName;
00077     NPT_UInt16                 m_Port;
00078     NPT_InputStreamReference   m_InputStream;
00079     NPT_OutputStreamReference  m_OutputStream;
00080     NPT_SocketInfo             m_SocketInfo;
00081     NPT_Reference<NPT_Socket>  m_Socket;
00082     bool                       m_Valid;
00083 };
00084 
00085 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 |   PLT_HttpClientSocketTask class
00087 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 class PLT_HttpClientSocketTask : public PLT_ThreadTask
00095 {
00096 friend class PLT_ThreadTask;
00097 
00098 public:
00099     PLT_HttpClientSocketTask(NPT_HttpRequest* request = NULL, 
00100                              bool             wait_forever = false);
00101 
00102     virtual NPT_Result AddRequest(NPT_HttpRequest* request);
00103 
00104 protected:
00105     virtual ~PLT_HttpClientSocketTask();
00106 
00107 protected:
00108     virtual NPT_Result SetConnector(PLT_HttpTcpConnector* connector);
00109     
00110     // PLT_ThreadTask methods
00111     virtual void DoAbort();
00112     virtual void DoRun();
00113 
00114     virtual NPT_Result ProcessResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00115                                        const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00116                                        const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00117                                        NPT_HttpResponse*             response);
00118 
00119 private:
00120     NPT_Result GetNextRequest(NPT_HttpRequest*& request, NPT_Timeout timeout_ms);
00121     NPT_Result SetConnector();
00122     NPT_Result ResetConnector();
00123 
00124 protected:
00125     NPT_HttpClient              m_Client;
00126     bool                        m_WaitForever;
00127     NPT_Queue<NPT_HttpRequest>  m_Requests;
00128     NPT_Mutex                   m_ConnectorLock;
00129     PLT_HttpTcpConnector*       m_Connector;
00130 };
00131 
00132 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 |   PLT_HttpClientTask class
00134 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00139 template <class T>
00140 class PLT_HttpClientTask : public PLT_HttpClientSocketTask
00141 {
00142 public:
00143     PLT_HttpClientTask<T>(const NPT_HttpUrl& url, T* data) : 
00144         PLT_HttpClientSocketTask(new NPT_HttpRequest(url, 
00145                                                      "GET", 
00146                                                      NPT_HTTP_PROTOCOL_1_1)), 
00147                                  m_Data(data) {}
00148  protected:
00149     virtual ~PLT_HttpClientTask<T>() {}
00150 
00151 protected:
00152     // PLT_HttpClientSocketTask method
00153     NPT_Result ProcessResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00154                                const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00155                                const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context, 
00156                                NPT_HttpResponse*             response) {
00157         return m_Data->ProcessResponse(res, request, context, response);
00158     }
00159 
00160 protected:
00161     T* m_Data;
00162 };
